title: Sight Reading: The Secret Skill of Fast Typists
description: Learn to read ahead of what you are typing to maintain a continuous flow and eliminate pauses.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
The Buffer

Fast typists read 1-2 seconds ahead of their fingers. This buffer allows the brain to process difficult words before the fingers reach them.

How to Train It

Practice typing while forcing your eyes to scan the next line. Don't look at the word you are currently typing.
